summary: Places a chest containing a full set of Wolf armor inside the Underforge.
descriptionHtml:
[[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/articles/51469]There will be no SE port of this mod. Read here for more information[/url]]

Places a chest containing a full set of Wolf armor inside the Underforge. You're a full member of The Companions now; time to look the part.

The chest is set to not respawn, so it should be safe for storing things, but I can't really guarantee that.

By request.
author: Rooker
